Welcome to Asyncing Ship’s Geovisualization documentation!¶

Welcome to the complete guide for Asyncing Ship’s geovisualization. This is a comprehesive guide on how to use the program we have built. In this guide we will be explaining the initial goal of this application. Before we get to the start up process lets dive into the program’s application and go over a brief explanation of what its allotted features will allow you to do.

Description¶

This program is designed to allow users to develop interactive maps that utilize shapefiles in order to plot points and import data sets that will change the visual appearance of the map you are uploading.
